headline: Ulta Beauty Stock (ULTA) Maintains Bold Comeback Following Q1 Beat
summary: After a rocky couple of years, Ulta Beauty (ULTA) is staging a fierce comeback, with its stock surging and its investment case looking increasingly better by the quarter. Evidently, the company’s Q1 results posted just last week lit a spark under the stock, showcasing robust comparable sales growth, strategic wins, and an aggressive share buyback program. Despite its recent rally, I believe Ulta Beauty still offers attractive value, making it a compelling choice for long-term investors. Here’s w

headline: Beauty brands blend AI into operations
